name: [LD34] Feta Feles
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 34 competition.

Based on a dream I had when I was 7 years old.

YOUR WORLD SEEMS TO HAVE DISAPPEARED ENTIRELY.
FELES IS YOUR ONLY COMPANION, NOW.
YOUR ABSOLUTION DEPENDS ON HER.
HOW FAR ARE YOU WILLING TO GO...?

Controls:
Enter- Skip cutscene
Arrows/WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left Mouse Button - "LOVE"
Hint: The "FOOD" will always be near the center of the arena.
